item.title: Project plan notes (Updated)
item.description:
List of current development (- = not completed) (+- party completed) (+completed)

+Hide bibles
+Tri vers database
+-Topical Bibles
  +-simple create form in user-features for user private(or shared) library
+-Database security http://php.net/manual/en/function.mysql-query.php check suggested alternatives(minimal completetion)
+Colored bookmarks..(selecting all)
+-color bible link for forum topics..
+colored comments and topics in bible content
+php edit/list files in main&inc for admin
+headline coloring in bibles
+-search through biblemaps
+table column for themes generated
+bibles grouped together by language for selecting all
+fixed forum menu(now appearing throughout the forum).
+-, to include multiple verses(Currently works with a single selected chapter).
+fixed "search highlight color" missing
+fixed *search all bibles* (also limited to selected bibles)
+fixed "search highlight" replacing withing html tags. and added css coloring.
+fixed "multiverse"; sql syntaxt "where" went missing.


-Login profile
-flasher
-users online
-bookmark and favorite notes
-link super like crossref
-redefine forum threads that two or more may prophecy together.(wiki-style)
-link forum to verse-highlight
  .-include ranges for verses, (and several verse positions^EASY).
-text highlight tool/javascript popup?
-messaging system with javascript "new message check".
-ranges for colors,notes,favorites. (using v2)
-redefine categories for multi categorical system/updating to number forks.
.-Numeric category system for multi category forum
-Link graphical map
-note,favorite,bookmark categories; editor and lister
-fix translation features to include multi-editing and clear view
-advances search results included while searching the bible (various optional results, separated by most likely logic).
-daily verses, and one random.
-verse ranges in bookmarks, favorites, notes, and crossreferences. (different color for ranges?)
-indicate if favorite.. is added in userfeatures
-include html file content:
-highlights for lookups
-colored highlights for auto-suggest.
-show which bid when doing search of multiple bibles
-copy paste/link topic map items/rearrange. (new kind of editor?)
-highlights inside ajax suggest
-group features

Ekklesia
-Gift listings and sharable capabilities
-Gathering after the manner of the scriptures
 

If you have other ideas, suggest.

By uid[1]

item.title: Major Changes
item.description:
I'm rearranging allot of code; please notify me if you notice anything not working for 20 seconds (after retrying).

Thank you

By uid[1]

item.title: $300 Dollar Pull
item.description:
After 3 efforted contributions by 3 different people I'll draw one winner of 300$ dollars.

The payment will be sent on paypal, so make sure you have a paypal account.

Come to the chat and speak about your contribution.

By uid[1]

item.title: Biblestudy Online
item.description:
Are you interested in studying the bible online together with someone?

Do you follow the Lord Jesus?

Then you are welcome.

Click on "Forum→Chat"

By uid[1]

item.title: Breakthrough development
item.description:
I'm experimenting with some new ways of searching, and I believe I can with some assistance make some highly advanced ways to search the bible.

This new way of searching will be a "most preferable feature".
One might even be asking "why didn't someone make this before".

I seek assistance by someone who knows a little javascripting.

Look at http://scripture.sourceforge.net/?shoot
 

By uid[1]

item.title: Visitors count hit the roof
item.description:
These last two weeks we have around 300 unique visitors every day.

About 2000 new and unique visitors in two week time.

Kriss

By uid[1]
